Articles.Content:
As some of you might know, I usualy only release aircraft. As you might guess this craft still has ties to the airplane domonated me. I have seen a few dream chasers on the forums lately. I though "So what the heck?". I made one and I like it, now I know why there is a few on the forums. Unlike the real "one" this has a RAPIER first stage, and two LV-T45's next. The plane part acualy flys pretty darn well if I do say so myself. The pictures usualy say alot so I will just shutup and let you see the acual thing.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

https://www./?9rvpv03r477035m

Hope you like it!
Neat idea! This is probably a very efficient design!
That's cool! Looks more like a Kliper than a Dream Chaser.

Actually it could probably be re-used. The first stage has liquid fuel left over and the second stage can be in orbit with half its fuel. And yes it is more like a kliper, it was the only way i could easily get the crew. I didn't realize that until after i posted it.
